conversation.text: I'm in the mood for a novella movie. Could you recommend a few?

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
I highly recommend watching 'Armageddon' if you're in the mood for a novel-like movie with an exciting plot. This film features an all-star cast including Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, and Steve Buscemi. The story revolves around a group of drillers who are sent to NASA after discovering that an asteroid is heading towards Earth!

If you're interested in something more surreal and thought-provoking, 'Things Fall Apart' might be up your alley. This film is a unique blend of drama and horror that explores the impact of a mysterious artifact on a group of old friends at a dinner party. It's definitely worth checking out!

"Rushmore", a quirky comedy-drama, tells the story of a precocious teenager's complex relationships with his teachers and a wealthy industrialist, starring Bill Murray and Jason Schwartzman.

On the other hand, "Pan's Labyrinth" is a dark fantasy film set in 1940s Spain, where a young girl escapes into an enchanting but ominous world filled with mystical creatures and danger. This visually stunning movie features performances by Sergi López and Doug Jones.
